title: Difficult Terrain
content:
Difficult Terrain Reduce Movement Speed by Half.

Difficult Terrain

Reduce Movement Speed by Half.

Difficult Terrain is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Difficult Terrain Information

Effect: Reduce Movement Speed by Half.

How to Acquire Difficult Terrain

Usually a spell or an environmental status effect. As most status effect usually refer to state affected by items bottle of Water
